data.text:
· Very comfortable stay, excellent room size and Value for money.....
-  spacious and comfortable Rooms. Very clean. Good Wifi, and AC.
- Perfect location, 10 mins from Airport , in walking distance to restaurants, breakfast cafes. Fresh juices, hair dressers, Bakery, pharmacy, Emergency hospital. Could not ask for a better location, most of the cafes and restaurants offer free delivery to your room
- Very courteous and friendly staff as usual, a huge shout out to Adeel at night security, Rudy on Concierge desk, Muhammad Istiak and Noor at Reception.
and finally not to forget the House keeping guys.
Looking forward to our next visit.
data.title: Our 2nd time here - Highly Recommend - Great Value and location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for choosing to stay with us!

We appreciate your positive feedback about our property. We are very pleased to hear that our staff made your stay pleasant. 

We are looking forward to welcoming you again as our valued guest.

Best Regards,

The Management.
owner_response.author: Sales Emirates

data.text:
Almost empty kitchen, dirty bathroom, unprofessional staff, bad location, ....
It will be my first & last stay in this hotel. NOT RECOMMENDED AT ALL
READ more reviews before you book to this hotel.
data.title: NOT RECOMMENDED

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
﻿
Thank you for letting us know about your recent experience with Emirates Stars Hotel Apartment Dubai!
﻿
With regard to your TripAdvisor review, we apologize if our services did not meet your expectations and we appreciate that you are taking the time to share your concerns.  This will give us the opportunity to deal with any problem that may exist and to help improve our services. 
﻿
Your feedback will be addressed accordingly. Rest assured that this issue will be rectified the soonest. 
﻿
Once again, please accept our sincerest apologies and we look forward to serving you better on your next visit. 
﻿
Best Regards,
owner_response.author: Nazia Sagheer

data.text: Very poor and unprofessional service from the front desk staff. They might help as a security, just to open the door to let people in and out. Other than that, they have no idea what it means to be at the front desk. While doing  their own business, they forgot about the image of the hotel. This review even might be handled by them or automated reply might come. But guests, read more reviews before staying in this hotel. What a disappointment!
data.title: Disappointed

data.text: I’ve never been in this kind of hotel before. Staff trying to exploit us by denying everything they said and things on the hotel ad. They even told us when we were late for our flight that plates and glasses are missing from our rooms. They taught we pay just because we were late. When we went to those rooms with their staff, everything was there. They don’t even check. We missed our flight because of their unprofessional work and we paid extra money for our flight for next day and for hotel to spent. Do not use this hotel. They apologize at the end when you leave, like it’ll make a difference. Kitchen almost empty and bath had black line because it was dirty. I would’ve given a zero if possible.
data.title: Stuff tries to exploits guests in anyway they can

data.text: Outstanding service by Front Office Muhammad Istiak and Waqas and bellman Joynal. Loved my one bedroom apartment. When i arrived, I was upgraded to a VIP suite and thoroughly enjoyed the spaciousness, comfort, and amenities of the suite. Enjoyed the view from the balcony and spent every morning watching the planes take off in the distance. A full kitchen made preparing snacks,tea, and warming up leftovers such a delightful feature. I will definitely be back to the Emirates Stars 🌟 Hotel and will bring friends :-) ✨️
data.title: Outstanding service and amenities
